content.description: Stand stand with underclings and good feet at the base of the wall. Move your feet up to a higher position on the wall and make a long reach up to into pockets directly above the starting position. From here match/find another good edge for the right hand, bring the feet and you should be able to reach up to good jugs just below the lip; topout straight up.
content.location: On the back of the Backwoods Slab, if walking to it from the trail leading away from the Pond Scum Boulder. Around the corner to the left of The Broken Binding.

content.description: Sit start at the base of the arete and work your way along to the right up to the highest point using small feet on the face and good holds along the arete. Mantle to finish at the highest point on the boulder. Watch out for the boulder behind you as you move up and right.
content.location: If looking at the boulder from the trail this would be on the right side, not facing the trail. It is easily visible if you are on the left side of the Back Woods Bloc.

content.description: Sit start on a large edge, with good feet below you on either side of the starting shelf, pull on and move both hands up into sloped pockets. Get the feet up into a position from which you can make a long reach up to the (currently) dirty triangular pocket; match it or grab nearby holds in the crack and then move up to the good jugs at the top of the boulder and topout straight up.
content.location: On the back of the Backwoods Slab, if walking to it from the trail leading away from the Pond Scum Boulder.

content.description: Stand start in front of the large heuco-like feature, use good edges in it to step onto the boulder, bring your feet up onto the slab and move straight up through the low angle slab using more edges and good crack holds to the top of the boulder.
content.location: Trailside slab on the Back Woods Slab

content.description: Squat start with left hand on sloped edge and right on a crimp near it, Pull on with feet at the bottom of the slab, move up onto the slab and track your feet into the start holds. Continue to move up the lower angle portion of the slab using good edges on the slab and holds along the left arete. Trend up and slightly right to finish as for The Burning Wheel.
content.location: Left side of the trail facing slab on the Back Woods Slab.

content.description: Sit start with hands on a large sloped shelf and good feet below you. Pull on and move up to an incut jug ledge for both hands, hike up high feet and then rock up onto the sloped shelf and press up to crack holds and jugs near the lip of the boulder; continue straight up to topout with good hand holds and feet.
content.location: On the back of the Backwoods Slab, if walking to it from the trail leading away from the Pond Scum Boulder. Around the corner to the left of The Broken Binding and Sympathy.

content.description: 12/13' tall low angle slab boulder right off the trail. It looks like the slab could host a few lines and the rest of the boulder may yield some other easier problems too.
